abstract: Investors everywhere should applaud the deal struck last week by the UnitedHealth Group to recover nearly $1 billion in pay from former executives involved in the company’s option backdating mess, writes Gretchen Morgenson in The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: Investors everywhere should applaud the deal struck last week by the UnitedHealth Group to recover nearly $1 billion in pay from former executives involved in the company’s option backdating mess, writes Gretchen Morgenson in The New York Times.

headline.main: Sharper Claws for Recovering Executive Pay
